thread.title: Hilton and Hyatt to open combined hotel in Washington D.C
thread.title_full: Hilton and Hyatt to open combined hotel in Washington D.C

title: Hilton and Hyatt to open combined hotel in Washington D.C
text:
0 comments Tom Newcombe Mon, 17 Aug 2015 08:58 Follow @thomasnewcombe Hilton and Hyatt Hotels have announced they will open a dual-branded property at The Wharf in Washington D.C.
The 175-room Canopy by Hilton and 238-room Hyatt House properties will combine a cafe/bar and other dining options, fitness centre, 2,500 sq ft of meeting room space, outdoor pool and rooftop bar.
The total built area for both hotels including ground-floor retail and shared space, is approximately 300,000 square feet.
The property will be located between Maine Avenue and Wharf Street and is due to open in autumn 2017.
"Hilton Worldwide is thrilled to be part of Washington, D.C.'s Wharf, one of the nation's most transformative waterfront redevelopments," said Christopher J. Nassetta , president and CEO of Hilton Worldwide.
